brandthis 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Updates the ggsci knowledge store

update_store.Rd

Downloads the latest version of the store from the brandthis GitHub repository and builds the search index locally.

Usage

update_store(pkg = c("paletteer", "ggsci"))

Arguments

pkg

ggsci or paletteer

Value

NULL invisibly.

Details

The download location can be configured with a few environment variables:

  • BRANDTHIS_STORE_URL: a custom URL to download the store from. The default is to download the latest store from the durraniu/brandthis repository in the store-v1 release.

  • BRANDTHIS_STORE_RELEASE: the release tag to download the store from. Defaults to store-v1.

  • BRANDTHIS_STORE_REPOSITORY: the repository to download the store from. Defaults to durraniu/brandthis.
